change_description: LRUQueryCache could cause IndexReader to hang on close, when shared with another reader with no CacheHelper
detail_description: If a QueryCache is shared between two searchers, one of which has an IndexReader with no CacheHelper, then CachingWrapperWeight can leak locks in scorerSupplier() and bulkScorer().  This can cause the IndexReader that does have a CacheHelper to hang on close.
